ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
Wait!
You hear something above us?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Aeris}
Don't worry.
You let me handle this.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
Don't worry.
I'll put her somewhere safe.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
We made it!
The pillar's standing!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
{Aeris}, do me a favor.{PAUSE}I have a bar called '7th Heaven' in
this neighborhood.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // There's a little girl
named Marlene there.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
It's dangerous here!{PAUSE}Everyone get away from the pillar, quickly!{PAUSE}Everyone get out of Sector 7!
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:10}); Bank[6][2] = pos.x; Bank[6][4] = pos.y; Bank[6][6] = pos.z; Bank[6][0] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Tifa}
{Cloud}!!
You've gotta go now,
or {Barret}'s

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Wedge
{Cloud}.
You rememberedmy name.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Barret}'s up top.
Help him

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // An' {Cloud}
Sorry, I wasn't any help.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:48}); // L, look This is my job, so
I have to be here
until the absolute last minute.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:49}); // Umm
I just LOVE men with a sense of duty.
Let me stay here with you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:50}); // B, but
What happens if AVALANCHE shows up?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:51}); // Ummyou're shaking.
You're so gentleI think I'm in love.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:41}); // What are you more scared of
AVALANCHE or me?{PAUSE}Oh, you, of course.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:38}); // Boy, it's been a while since SOLDIER's been
mobilized, hasn't it?{PAUSE}I ever tell you that I flunked the
SOLDIER entrance exam?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:33}); // You know, I got some tickets to
'Loveless', do you want to go?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Cloud}, are you really
concerned for me?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:37}); // Right. You mean the AVALANCHE?{PAUSE}Don't you worry.
SOLDIER has been added to the police force.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // Ahehuhm.
Excuse me. You cannot pass
without the proper clearance.
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // Did I do good this time?
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // W, wow! You're great!!
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // You gotta be tougher!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // What're you, retarded?
Midgar's under martial law now!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // Hell no!!
But in case you forgot,
we're in the middle of a slum.{PAUSE}They could be anywhere around,
so stay on your guard.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // Damn right!!
blahblahblah{PAUSE}Hey shut up for a minute
and let me get back to work!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // Uh oh
There goes the pillar.{PAUSE}I'm scared,
but it's for your own good.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // If things get too hairy, we'll escape.
It's not something
you'll see happen too often.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:47}); // UhhHelp!
My strange and wonderful little place.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:20}); // What on earth are you doing?
Just butt outgeez!{PAUSE}Huh?
You came to see it, too?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:21}); // There was a bombing on top.
If this pillar should come down,
everyone in the slums is dust{PAUSE}Well,
there's no point in worryin' about that.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:22}); // Hey!! Check it out!
It's huge, ain't it?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:23}); // Hey
This is a strange and wonderful place.{PAUSE}This is my place,
but you can come here when you want.
See ya, bro!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:43}); // [Save Point]
Access the menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

Don't waste time talkin's
what I always say!

What the hell do you want?

You can't pass.
I got the miserable job of keepin'

Listen
My partner's pretty mean,

{Cloud}, are you really

Hell no!!

we're in the middle of a slum.{PAUSE}They could be anywhere around,
so stay on your guard.

Right. You mean the AVALANCHE?{PAUSE}Don't you worry.

blahblahblah{PAUSE}Hey shut up for a minute

sigh.
